Welcome to the documentation of X-ray stack models¶

This is a python package that predicts the X-ray emission coming from the large scale structure of the Universe. It supports the interpretation of X-ray stacks.

Modules and classes to handle the model¶

  • Galaxy model
    • GAL
      • GAL.add_kmag()
      • GAL.add_magnitudes_direct_match_K()
      • GAL.construct_OBS_kdTree()
  • Gas model
    • GAS
      • GAS.calc_lx()
      • GAS.draw_simulated_values()
      • GAS.populate_cat()
      • GAS.prepare_halo_cat()
  • AGN model
    • AGN
      • AGN.abundance_matching()
      • AGN.compute_agn_type()
      • AGN.compute_fluxes()
      • AGN.compute_r_mag()
      • AGN.get_obscured_fractions()
      • AGN.get_tabulated_AGN()
      • AGN.get_z_mass_id()
